item.description:
Reiki I

Monday January 7th and 21st, 2013

7-9pm

Cost $150 for Level I, class meets twice ($50 for the Reiki Review)

Presented by Lisa Campion

Reiki is a gentle and powerful healing technique that anyone can learn! Reiki Level I focuses on healing physical body and after you complete level I, you can do Reiki on yourself, your friends, your family, even your pets and your plants! Best of all it's easy to learn, anyone can. Put the power of healing in your own hands and see for yourself how Reiki can change your life!

I will also be offering a Reiki review.

Can’t remember your Reiki?

Forgot your all your Reiki Symbols?

Or maybe you haven’t practiced all that much...

No worries! We got you covered. You can retake my Reiki class with me for just $50, wow! Brush the dust of your hot hands and lets bust out some Reiki moves so you can carry on healing the world with confidence.

For more information email solsticehealing@yahoo.com or Call 508-533-0669

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Reiki I
